name: Dreary Dreams
description:
This story is part of the MiracleCore universe. Here you play as the Guardian Angel, and your task is to decide the fate of the heroes.

Story

The plot will unfold in a distant cruel village in which the protagonist will suffer a terrible fate. People will often start beating him, bullying him, insult him, etc. Will he finally be able to find the exit from this village or will he continue to live with this fate. It's up to YOU to decide how things will go from here.

(In outside can be lagging, so be careful, please...)

(P.S. It's not Alpha, it's Demo.)

Characters   Hikeru Oomori: 

He was born in an orphanage and was happy there. But then he was adopted and his life turned into hell. Now he is afraid to escape, because of his adopted parents and the inhabitants in the village.

Taro Hayashi: 

He is an orphan from another orphanage. Because of his 'father''s death, he started acting like a bully, demanding money from people for 'curing his father'. Her mother also works as a teacher in order to survive, along with her son.

Amber: 

The woman was discharged from the psychological hospital, but her health remained mentally unhealthy, who knows what could h̷͇͌̇a̵̮͌v̴͔̱̅ȅ̶̳ h̸͇̓̏͝a̵͉̮̙̋̈p̵̲͛p̷͈̑̄e̵̐̿͌͜n̴̳̻̬̉̀̄ẻ̵̞̬̭d̵͓̅ ţ̸̹̠̖̘̌̉́̕ō̵̠̽̆ h̵̦̬̬͚̣̲̱̪̪͙̯̾́̂e̷̢͎͍̪͉͎̙̭̍͋̓ȑ̷̺̠̩̺̟̟̺̮̩̍͊͗̍̐͝.̸̗͎͖͎̩̯̖̭̥͍͖̻͙͒̋͊̏́̃͆͌̄͛̀ͅͅ. <̶̧̧̘̣̙̩̙̙̗̝̺̀̐͒͆̈͋͆̎̃̚̚͠͝͝~̵͔̦̤̼͓̮̪͕̞̼̣̮͊́͗̌͘͠ͅ<̷̧̦͚͓̙̳̰̘̦͇̭͇̉̃̄̆̀̂̏̚͝͠+̸̨̜͖̠̮̫͚͎͗̍̿́̉̀̔̊́̀̓̈ơ̷̭͙̦̯͈̙̹͔̫̬͕̎͊͊̈́̅̀̏̓͌̋̿ͅḯ̵̡̞̺͎̥̝͕̖̮͔`̸̛̱̩͇̱̎̀͑̃͊̆̐͌̑̌̕͝Ȃ̸̢̭̝͈͇̩̣͍̹̲̌͌̉̈Ḷ̷̻͖̟̬͖́̾D̴͓̟̮̱͉̞̫͓̯̖͓̺͓̼̖̓͊̍̆̽̂͑̐̕O̷̜͐̎̑̐͗̐̾͆͆̇̕̚͝͠͝Ą̵͙̣͕̗̭̙̰͉̃͐̅͗͌̌͘Ḑ̷̢̣͖̝̱̮̘̟̳̂̿͋̑͑̃͠͝͝ͅJ̸̡͙̲̱͙͙͖̟̼̳͔͕̪̱̒̆͗͝s̷̭̣͛̇͊͌͐̋͛̒͝͠W̸̰̙̣̩̦͕̫̲̭̟̺͉̟̊̎̋̚͝1̴̛̟̱̃͊̓́͌̋͊̓̿͛̕͝B̵̛͎͌̔̊̓͑̂͒̆̔̎͌͑l̶̹͈̺̭̙̳͕̽̈͂̃͒̉̓̇̆͝͝7̸̯̦͛͊̎͆̌͗̌͐͝Q̸̡̡̦̣̙̤̗͊͌̅̒̚͠+̷̛̥͆͆̓̀͆̓̉̀̌̈̉̑̿̂B̷̯͕̞̼͋͝O̴̧̖̘̝̞̲̳̬͙̅̈́͂̓́͘ų̴̨̯̝̗͖̺̱̪͕͓̹̦͗͐̓̉̉̔̓̊̕͘͝3̵̰͇̔q̶̧͕͓̩̱̻͕͓̓̃̂̒/̸̢̢̪̳͓̼̞̘̮͑̊̀̀́͊̓͝ͅ0̷͍̜̤̠͔̩̰̃̊́͋́̊̽̚͝J̶̨̮̥͖̲̻̱̭̹̞͔͉̊͜S̵͉̟͓̎͆̒̓̐̆̚͝D̸̨͕̼̞̘̝͎̼̱̓̅̏̑́̋̔̑͘͝͠͠ͅ+̷̧̨͎̪̺͎̻̝͍̱͙̉̇͊̈̂̓̒͜͜C̶̡̮̬̮̖̖̮͇̱̱̭̳̱̮̐̀̅̏͝ͅT̶̢̡̛͔̗̮̹͖̘̠̳̊̑̊̋̇̍̽͐̆͂͐͘͠ͅͅJ̵̛̛̛̱́̆̀̈́̃̔̓̾̄̋&̷̲̰̮̘̖͛̌́̀̇͝G̵̛͉̬̖̘͎̤̽͂͛̎͋͒͂̆̾̽̄͘q̴̡͉̟̝̖͉͓̞̘̦̟̪̈́̂͛͗̆̕͘K̵̭̤̳̀̿́̑̇̀̈́͑̉̏̕͘͝~̵̢͍̻̬̫̘̿͜>̶͎̹̩̺̦̮͉͕̖͔͍͔͔͇̋́̆͜
